scripts.say: Intelligence reports that the Ironblood's newest battleships are set to sail through this area. If we surprise them here, the Queen will surely reward us upon our return!
*Sobs* Battleships? Are we really going to be a match for them?
The water here is so cold... My entire body feels like its turning into ice... Why don't we just hurry back to port?
It's going to be fine! We're just here to scout. If a fight kicks off, it'll be up to our big sisters to handle it. They're close by and ready to provide support whenever we need it~!
All I see is fog and ice... I don't think anyone else is around. Plus, no matter what battleship appears, they'll turn tail and run once they find out that our big sisters are here, haha!
Something feels strange though, don't you think? I'd be relieved if we just spent the rest of our day looking out to sea and then heading home for dinner...
Hmm? Wait a second... My radar seems to be picking up a strange signal up ahead...
Ironblood destroyer squadron detected ahead! Maybe it's just a few scouts? Report to Hood immediately!
My... my antenna is... f-f-frozen into... a p-p-popsicle...
We've got to hold off their squadron. It's just a few production-type destroyers... We should be able to handle this!
Are... are we going to fight? *Sobs* I knew this would happen...
